transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. 
Customer: Dekh lungi.
Executive: Haan. Haan, Ankur ji.
Customer: Yes, kaun hai? Haan, sir abhi baat hui thi na Tejas bol raha tha India Mart se.
Customer: Hmm, bolo.
Executive: Keh raha tha ki koi WhatsApp pe aapke paas ek feedback ka option aaya tha to aap not satisfied mark kar diya. Actually kya hai usse mere matlab as a individual level pe mere ko kafi effect padta hai sir.
Customer: Mujhe laga aap actually I guess. Ji.
Executive: India Mart se bol rahe hain aap?
Customer: India Mart se bol raha hu sir ji.
Customer: Haan to sir India Mart pe to nahi abhi thodi der pehle phone kiya tha kya abhi aapne thodi der pehle phone kiya tha kya mere ko?
Executive: Thodi der pehle haan aapse baat hui thi na sir mere abhi regarding pura aapse maine baat kiya tha aap keh rahe the ki theek hai kal connect karte hain ispe hum kuch kaam karte hain sath mein milke catalog vagera pe.
Customer: Us samay trade trade India ka naam le rahe the us samay to.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi trade India nahi hai sir. India Mart
Customer: India Mart baat kar rahe hain. India Mart aap trade India samjhe sir. Sir trade India se thodi na sir. Haan to sir aapka to hisab kitab sir bahut bekar chal raha hai aapko baat bata du main. Us samay main confuse ho gaya tha. Isiliye bata nahi paya aapko ab bata deta hu main sir. Aapke yahan se to mere paas koi kaam nahi koi conversion nahi na koi lead hai na koi buylead na koi call hai kuch nahi hai. Aapki baar sir hum to isko band karenge.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye wo decision aapka hai. Sir ji wo decision aapka hai ki aapko use chalayenge ki nahi chalayenge. Par main main paisa de rakha hai abhi tak main keh raha hu suno.
Customer: Ji service li hai na 106000 ki 16000 ki. Abhi tak ek ek rupay ka conversion nahi aaya bolo aur kya aur kya karoge hone tak.
Executive: Sir ji ek sir ji sirf services lene se conversion aane laga hota to fir to kya hi baat hoti sir aap pure mahine mein teen din khole hain account.
Customer: Sir roz kholte hain. Main ye keh raha hu isko set karwate karwate na suno sir sir meri baat suno.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Sir main kya keh raha hu main isko set karwate karwate thak gaya bar bar bar bar isko set karwate karwate karwate thak gaya. Wo wo jo bhi kabhi koi bolta hai kabhi ha Priyanshi ha Priyanshi thi pehle manager. Priyanshi ji baat kar rahi thi. Usne ha 200 bar set kar chuka roz roz phone karke mere paas bhi samay nahi hai to main pure din kaam chod ke matha marne baith jau. Main aapki baat samajhta hu roz roz roz roz koi aisa call to hai nahi ek aad minute ka fir aadhe aadhe ghante tak chalti hai. Ha sir kaam to karna padta hai. Ji ji ji ek baat hai.
Customer: To isme ye problem hai. Madam ye kehti thi aap kholte nahi ho maine banda lagaya din bhar khol ke baitha rehta ab just now pe bhi jo buylead aa rahi hai na. Hmm hmm. Just now pe jo lead aa rahi hai wo bhi sold out ho jati hai main madam ko bolta tha madam aise aise panga pad raha hai. Hmm hmm. Maine bola madam aise aise aise aise panga chal raha hai madam ji. Wo keh rahe ji aap aap kya hai unme jo wo hote hain na matlab ek inquiry panch ko jati hai fir. Ha lead panch logo ko jati hai. Sahi baat hai. Panch ko jati hai madam main to madam main inki hum bhi to kisi panch mein honge. Bilkul aap sabke panch mein aate hain aur sabse pehle aap hi hote hain agar aap consume kare to. Uska main babu ji main kya keh raha hu just now pe just now ka matlab kya hota hai aai aur consume kari usme bhi lead sold out ho rahi hai mere paas se to iska matlab hum gini panch mein hai nahi fir maine bhi maine bhi chod diya maine chalo koi baat nahi ab to de rakhe hain paise wo hoga kuch ho jayega warna pada rehne do. Sir ji aap thode confuse hain main dekho pehli cheez batata hu aapka jo account hai na wo mujhe assign isiliye hi kiya gaya tha kyuki Priyanshi mam se jo aapka coordination ho raha tha lekin koi result aane nahi raha tha. Meri expertise rahi hai ki maine catalog mein bhi kafi acha kaam karwaya aur laake conversion bhi diye hain isiliye aapka account mujhe diya gaya ki Tejas sir se milo sir se baat karo aur sir ka ye account ko clear karo. Isi regarding maine aapko aaj phone bhi kiya tha kyuki kafi samay se aapse meri baat nahi ho pa rahi thi to maine ki sir se ek bar coordination karke at least ek bar main pehle ye bata du sir ko ki hame karna kya hai kyuki maine aapko abhi bhi call kiya na maine aapko yahi bola tha sir hame kuch milke kuch kaam karna padega. Ab dekhiye main aapko ye main thoda sa kahin bahar aaya hu phone zyada baat nahi kar paunga kal aap mere ko ye nahi keh raha haan.
Customer: Aap aaram se kal mujhe mil lo kal aaram se coordinate kar lo theek hai. Par main aapko itna bol ke chal raha hu sir pehli cheez to ye ki abhi dekhiye koi bhi cheez jaise aap not satisfied bhi kiye hain na to wo aap India Mart se aapko conversion nikal ke nahi aaya isiliye kiye hain. Par aap ye man ke chaliye ki dekhiye agar aap ye bole ki kuch bhi India Mart ne nahi kiya aisa bhi possible nahi hai sir aur agar main kahu ki aapne sab kuch kiya aur India Mart ne kuch nahi kiya ye bhi possible nahi hai. Kahin na kahin kuch na kuch sir miscommunication rahi hai jaise main agar dekh raha hu last 90 days mein around 20 days aap active rahe the matlab 90 din mein aap 20 din kam se kam active rahe jisme aapne dekha kareeb kareeb 35 call aapke paas aayi last teen mahine ke andar jisme agar main dekh raha hu lagbhag lagbhag 80% aapne call uthai ek do call aapki divert ho gayi theek hai. Hmm hmm. Hamare paas jo sir catalog hai hamari jo bhi is samay listed hai catalog usme jo quality score aata hai na matlab hamare jitne bhi product dale hue hain jisme photo dali hai specification dali hai aapne kaiyo bar changes kare hain main dekh raha hu par lagbhag abhi 11 product aise hain jinme koi photo nahi dali hai jinko main aapse one by one dekh ke baat karke karwa dunga koi dikkat nahi hai. Kal karenge phone bhi aa raha hai main thoda sa kahin bahar hua aaj kal phone karenge theek hai na. Not satisfied mat mark kar kariye sir usse hamari feedback kharab ho jati hai warna individual level pe humse pucha jata hai ki humne aisa kya kar diya aapke sath jo aapne not satisfied mark kar diya isiliye chaliye maine phone kiya tha aapko. Theek hai theek hai to koi bhi cheez ho aap mujhe directly contact kijiye main aapka bilkul solve karunga jo bhi problem apne end se ho sakegi sir hai na. Okay sir okay ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- No conversions, leads, or calls received.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.

- Account setup issues and repeated calls for assistance.

- Inquiries being distributed to multiple recipients.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged customer's concerns.

- Executive offered to review and improve catalog.

- Executive explained account assignment for better service.

- Executive highlighted customer's activity and call statistics.



Next Steps: 

- Executive and customer will coordinate the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, not satisfied
